howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: From finding a job offer to being ready for the interview — in one place.

steps.title: Upload your CV
steps.description: HireTree extracts your skills and experience automatically. Your raw CV is never stored.

steps.title: Save a job offer
steps.description: Use the browser extension on JustJoinIT or NoFluffJobs to add an offer with one click.

steps.title: See your match score
steps.description: HireTree compares your skills against the offer requirements and shows what you're missing.

steps.title: Simulate the interview
steps.description: Get questions generated specifically for the offer's stack and seniority level. Answer, get feedback, improve.

steps.title: Track your pipeline
steps.description: Move offers through stages: Saved → Applied → Interview → Offer. Stay on top of every application.

howItWorks.problemText: Job boards tell you "72% match" — but not what to do about the missing 28%. HireTree gives you a concrete action plan: what to learn, how to prepare, and when you're ready.
